title: Steve Jones
description:
Former member of Sex Pistols and The Professionals. This are his two solo records. This is NOT punk music anymore for those who expects a continuing of the pistols sound. The first record Mercy is mostly made up of love songs with a heavier sound reminding mostly of get a bunch of friends have some drinks and oo yeah i have allot of love songs lets gig a record out. Its easy to listen and not to bad. The second record is more of a normal heavy rock album and does contain some gems actually if you are into heavier music.

The title song Mercy was also featured in the Miami Vice 2 soundtrack.


Mercy [1987]

Fire And Gasoline (1989)
